db_optimization.notification: Your database requires optimization, please go to Settings tab and click [Optimize database] button.
db_optimization.already_optimized: Database is already optimized. Nothing to do.
db_optimization.confirm: Your database requires optimization. It is recommended to backup your data before proceeding.

preprocessor.description_md:
Preprocessor can optimize your journey data:
- **Generic** suitable for most tracks, filtering out abnormal data and reasonably segmenting the data.
- **FlightTrack** suitable for flight tracks, etc., using interpolation to complete missing parts of the path.

import_fow_data.description_md:
Import data generated from the Fog of World app.

This feature supports the following formats:
1. Zip format: Compress the Fog of World cloud sync "Sync" folder into a Zip archive.
2. Fwss format: Fog of World snapshot file.

The Fog of World app data does not include history. The exported data only contains the whole tracks from the start until the export point. If you have multiple historical Fog of World data, you can try uploading these to [Fog Machine - Time Machine](https://fogmachine.8bits.io/time-machine) and using the "Export MemoLanes Archive" feature.
import_fow_data.warning_for_import_multiple_data_md:
Note: The database already contains Fog of World data.

When importing multiple data snapshots, please ensure that these snapshots do not overlap, or use the "Export MemoLanes Archive" feature in [Fog Machine - Time Machine](https://fogmachine.8bits.io/time-machine). This feature processes snapshots one by one by calculating differences, achieving the effect of matching historical tracks with their corresponding time.

unexpected_exit_notification.notification_permission_reason: In order to remind you when the program exits, we will request notification permission.
unexpected_exit_notification.notification_permission_denied: You have denied permission. You can modify it later in settings.
unexpected_exit_notification.change_affect_next_time: Your changes will take effect in the next recording.
unexpected_exit_notification.notification_message: Recording was unexpectedly stopped, please restart the app.

beta_testing_notice.title: Welcome to MemoLanes Public Beta
beta_testing_notice.content_md:
Thank you for testing MemoLanes!

Please be aware of the following:
* The app may occasionally lag, crash, or glitch.
* Features are still being optimized and may change in the final release, so they may not reflect their final quality.
* We recommend backing up your data regularly (go to the far-right [Settings] icon on the navigation bar > [Export All Data]).

If you run into any issues, please take a screenshot to share with our team—it helps a lot! Suggestions are also welcome. You can find us via [Settings] > [Contact Us].

If you enjoy using MemoLanes, feel free to share it with others. Your support motivates us to keep improving. 🫶🏻

Wish you great journeys ahead—let’s explore the world together! 🚀

privacy.privacy_tip_message_md:
You need to agree to the privacy policy before using MemoLanes.

You can read the full version of the [MemoLanes Privacy Policy](@:privacy.url) for more details.
privacy.name: Privacy Policy
